title: Freedom UI | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.0 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.0 Page customization Field Toggle panel Timeline Communication options System variable System setting Web service Additional feature Open page Closing the WebSocket
markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.0**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/getting-started/development-recommendations)** (8.3).
